## Source: ossf-package-analysis (974c3dd29aac6ad71fdd0dda8efd882f35ddc0b22f738a744cbe0cc35f946be0)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'mtvqa' @ 912.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
